message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $80.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is my bottom line. This product is high-quality and worth the investment. What do you say?
